item.title: About
item.description: I am interested in universal machines for information storage and manipulation :-). Among other things. To be a bit more specific, I dabble in systems administration, security and programming. I log some of the technical activities I should do. I try to be nice to people (it’s not an easy task). I like sports, books and languages. Some of my (free time) software projects: quotes Profesia Jobs App::Monport lsfat checkprocs Pearls I found on the Internet:

item.title: CV
item.description: I have been doing IT stuff for companies of varied sizes and types for 10+ years. My experience is mainly in systems administration (SRE) and IT security. I have touched several infrastructures and done quite some programming or scripting. I try to stay on top of new technologies and practices and use them when/where appropriate. I am not bad at managing smaller projects and teams. I can communicate well with technical and non-technical folks.

item.title: Links
item.description: Some of my (free time) software projects: quotes Profesia Jobs App::Monport lsfat checkprocs Pearls I found on the Internet: The saddest phone in Berlin How to daemonize a process Larry Wall on Perl, religion, and… What problems to solve xkcd - Lisp Buy me stuff if you want to make me happy :-). I take photos from time to time.
